simula an algol based simulation language this paper is introduction to a programming language designed provide systems analyst with unified concepts which facilitate the concise description of discrete event a system also serves as source simulation program extension 60 in most important new that quasi parallel processing cacm september 1966 dahl o j nygaard k ca660907 jb march 2 1978 6 21 pm 1024 4 1380 1051 1086 1098 1132 1214 1234 1263 1265 1270 1323 1358 1379 1388 1393 1453 1464 1484 1485 1487 1491 1498 1549 1552 1570 1613 1614 1665 1693 1781 1787 1825 1854 1860 1878 1946 1957 1989 2060 2083 2112 2168 2178 2179 2252 2325 2341 2534 2541 2546 2645 2652 2684 2698 2723 2733 2820 2842 2857 2929 2934 557 3069 3073 3112 3155 669 679 691 761 949 989 5 1421 1541 1846 2218 3184 731 799 106 1424 1469 1477 1572 1728 1751 1752 1810 1826 210 1869 1879 1972 2095 2110 2438 2736 2833 2838 576
